name: Slime Pet (ScarredSceptile)
description:
Simple Tamagotchi game made for a uni project where we need to do a game jam in 48 hours.

Saving is implemented in the game, but there is no autosave.

The slime will lose 1 bar of hunger every 4 hours, 1 bar of cleanliness every 5 hours and 1 bar of happiness every 3 hours.
